/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, indicating a busy traffic flow. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the background, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
